tags.name: maincube
tags.content: MainCube visualizes your Domain → Node → Files as a grid with hoverable connections to internal files.

tags.name: nodecube
tags.content: NodeCube visualizes how each file inside a node links to tag badges and context references in deeper cubes.

tags.name: contextcube
tags.content: ContextCube visualizes how tags and files are reused across other cubes — both superparent and crossparent references.
